column4: sudo -i simulates a login and unsets a bunch of variables as well as launching the shell from /etc/passwd, it's not quite the same thing as just preventing him from having to use sudo..
running with the pid of the root user from /etc/passwd?
I'd say that fairly well qualifies you as running everything as root :P
i dont do anything as "root" unless i have to
right. Sorry, I misread what you said in context to infer that you ran everything using sudo :P
because it isn't a dapper-specific issue, properly
by the release it will be open for more
they will be opening up for more soon
ah, they're tiering the number people can order?
right.. so they are tiering 6.06 submissions and they'll allow >10 in a while?
cool. What's the reason for the tiering, to get CDs out to a larger number of people initially?
as far as i know they just havent added it to site yet maybe they dont know how many people will be making them
